questions.ques:
Now think of your life and put in all those things/situations/aspects that are bothering you and taking most of your attention/mind-space : Fill them in here ...

Your list A :

Now think hard about the aspects of your life/issues/things that you are tending to ignore/pay less attention due to being preoccupied with other issues that you feel are stressing/overwhelming you.

Make a list of these aspects which contain some action points for you (like the list B of Rakesh)

Your list B :
Now visualize how much it might make you feel better and function better if you were to devote some time and energy to these controllable aspects of your life.
